title: PubChem BioAssay
scope: High-throughput biochemical and cell-based assays for millions of compounds.
description: PubChem provides quantitative bioassay results that link molecular structure to biological activity, forming the foundation for AI-driven drug discovery and toxicity prediction.
use: Molecular activity prediction, drug screening, target discovery

title: ChEMBL Bioactivity Database
scope: Curated bioactivity data from scientific literature and screening campaigns.
description: ChEMBL aggregates bioactivity measurements from thousands of assays and drug discovery studies — connecting molecular targets, mechanisms, and pharmacological outcomes. Ideal for building predictive AI models in medicinal chemistry.
use: Drug-target modeling, mechanism prediction, pharmacophore mapping

title: MassIVE Proteomics
scope: Public repository for mass spectrometry-based proteomics and metabolomics data.
description: UCSD’s MassIVE hosts terabytes of proteomic and metabolomic spectra — a critical bridge between chemical structures and biological pathways, ideal for training multimodal AI models on molecular signatures.
use: Spectral feature extraction, protein interaction mapping, omics AI modeling

title: Human Protein Atlas
scope: Atlas of human protein expression in tissues and cells using antibody-based proteomics.
description: The Human Protein Atlas combines imaging, transcriptomics, and antibody-based assays to map protein localization across tissues, cancers, and single cells — connecting molecular and phenotypic biomarkers.
use: Imaging biomarker discovery, cell-specific AI modeling, precision pathology

title: ATILA Biosystems Diagnostics
scope: Validated molecular diagnostic assays including qPCR and genotyping panels.
description: ATILA Biosystems develops CE-marked and FDA-cleared diagnostic kits for infectious disease detection, cancer mutation screening, and genetic testing — connecting molecular signatures to real-world health outcomes.
use: Clinical biomarker validation, precision medicine, diagnostic AI training

title: ClinicalTrials.gov
scope: Registry and results database of publicly and privately supported clinical studies.
description: ClinicalTrials.gov integrates structured metadata on clinical trial phases, disease focus, and biomarkers — connecting experimental and diagnostic data to patient outcomes for translational AI research.
use: Outcome prediction, biomarker validation, translational informatics
